parameters.name: AttemptInterval
parameters.description: The interval of retries after a job failure. Default value: 30. Unit: seconds.

parameters.name: Calendar
parameters.description: If you set TimeType to 1 (cron), you can specify calendar days.

parameters.name: ClassName
parameters.description:
The full path of the job interface class.

This field is available only when you set the job type to java. In this case, you must enter a full path.

parameters.name: ConsumerSize
parameters.description: The number of threads that are triggered by a single worker at a time. Default value: 5. This parameter is an advanced configuration item of the MapReduce job.

parameters.name: ContactInfo
parameters.description: The information about the alert contact.

parameters.name: Content
parameters.description: The script content. This parameter is required when you set the job type to python, shell, go, or k8s.

parameters.name: DataOffset
parameters.description: If you set TimeType to 1 (cron), you can specify a time offset. Unit: seconds.

parameters.name: Description
parameters.description: The job description.

parameters.name: DispatcherSize
parameters.description: The number of task distribution threads. Default value: 5. This parameter is an advanced configuration item of the MapReduce job.

parameters.name: ExecuteMode
parameters.description:
The execution mode of the job. Valid values:

*   **Stand-alone operation**: standalone
*   **Broadcast run**: broadcatst
*   **Visual MapReduce**: parallel
*   **MapReduce**: batch
*   **Shard run**: shard

parameters.name: FailEnable
parameters.description:
Specifies whether to turn on Failure alarm. If the switch is turned on, an alert will be generated upon a failure. Valid values:

*   **true**
*   **false**

parameters.name: FailTimes
parameters.description: The number of consecutive failures. An alert will be received if the number of consecutive failures reaches the value of this parameter.

parameters.name: GroupId
parameters.description: The application ID. You can obtain the application ID on the Application Management page in the SchedulerX console.

parameters.name: JobId
parameters.description: The job ID. You can obtain the job ID on the Task Management page in the SchedulerX console.

parameters.name: MaxAttempt
parameters.description: The maximum number of retries after a job failure. This parameter is specified based on your business requirements.

parameters.name: MaxConcurrency
parameters.description: The maximum number of concurrent instances. Default value: 1. The default value indicates that only one instance is allowed to run at a time. When an instance is running, another instance is not triggered even if the scheduled time for running the instance is reached.

parameters.name: MissWorkerEnable
parameters.description:
Specifies whether to turn on No machine alarm available. If the switch is turned on, an alert will be generated when no machine is available for running the job. Valid values:

*   **true**
*   **false**

parameters.name: Name
parameters.description: The job name.

parameters.name: Namespace
parameters.description: The namespace ID. You can obtain the namespace ID on the Namespace page in the SchedulerX console.

parameters.name: NamespaceSource
parameters.description: The namespace source. This parameter is required only for a special third party.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of tasks that can be pulled at a time. Default value: 100. This parameter is an advanced configuration item of the MapReduce job.

parameters.name: Parameters
parameters.description: The user-defined parameters that you can obtain when the job is running.

parameters.name: QueueSize
parameters.description: The maximum number of tasks that can be queued. Default value: 10000. This parameter is an advanced configuration item of the MapReduce job.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description: The region ID.

parameters.name: SendChannel
parameters.description: The method that is used to send alerts. Only Short Message Service (SMS) is supported.

parameters.name: SuccessNoticeEnable
parameters.description: Specifies whether to turn on Successful notice. If the switch is turned on, a notice will be sent when a job succeeds.

parameters.name: TaskAttemptInterval
parameters.description: The interval of retries after a task failure. This parameter is an advanced configuration item of the MapReduce job.

parameters.name: TaskDispatchMode
parameters.description: The job mode. Valid values: push and pull. This parameter is an advanced configuration item of the MapReduce job.

parameters.name: TaskMaxAttempt
parameters.description: The number of retries after a task failure. This parameter is an advanced configuration item of the MapReduce job.

parameters.name: Template
parameters.description: Custom task template for the k8s task type.

parameters.name: TimeExpression
parameters.description:
The time expression. Specify the time expression based on the value of TimeType:

*   If you set TimeType to **1** (cron), specify this parameter to a standard CRON expression.
*   If you set TimeType to **100** (api), no time expression is required.
*   If you set TimeType to **3** (fixed_rate), specify this parameter to a fixed frequency in seconds. For example, if you set this parameter to 30, the system triggers a job every 30 seconds.
*   If you set TimeType to **4** (second_delay), specify this parameter to a fixed delay after which the job is triggered. Valid values: 1 to 60. Unit: seconds.

parameters.name: TimeType
parameters.description:
The time type. Valid values:

*   **1**: cron
*   **3**: fix_rate
*   **4**: second_delay
*   **100**: api

parameters.name: Timeout
parameters.description: The timeout threshold. Unit: seconds.

parameters.name: TimeoutEnable
parameters.description:
Specifies whether to turn on Timeout alarm. If the switch is turned on, an alert will be generated upon a timeout. Valid values:

*   **true**
*   **false**

parameters.name: TimeoutKillEnable
parameters.description:
Specifies whether to turn on Timeout termination. If the switch is turned on, the job will be terminated upon a timeout. Valid values:

*   **true**
*   **false**

parameters.name: Timezone
parameters.description: Time zone.

parameters.name: XAttrs
parameters.description: If you set JobType to k8s, this parameter is required. xxljob task: {"resource":"job"} shell task: {"image":"busybox","resource":"shell"}
